statements: SELECT * FROM loan_agreements;
SELECT agreement_id, borrower_id, lender_id FROM loan_agreements WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM loan_agreements WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT borrower_id, loan_amount, start_date FROM loan_agreements ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(loan_amount) AS avg_loan_amount FROM loan_agreements GROUP BY status;
SELECT * FROM loan_agreements WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT agreement_id, borrower_id, lender_id, loan_amount, start_date FROM loan_agreements ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT borrower_id, lender_id, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM loan_agreements WHERE loan_amount > 10000 AND status = 'approved';
SELECT agreement_id, borrower_id, lender_id, loan_amount, interest_rate, start_date, end_date FROM loan_agreements WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT agreement_id, borrower_id, lender_id, loan_amount, interest_rate, start_date, end_date, status FROM loan_agreements WHERE lender_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM loan_agreements WHERE agreement_id = 1;
SELECT borrower_id, loan_amount, start_date FROM loan_agreements WHERE lender_id = 5;
SELECT agreement_id, borrower_id, end_date FROM loan_agreements ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT agreement_id, interest_rate, start_date FROM loan_agreements WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM repayment_schedules WHERE due_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT * FROM loan_agreements WHERE agreement_id = 1;
SELECT borrower_id, lender_id, loan_amount FROM loan_agreements WHERE interest_rate > 4.5;
SELECT agreement_id, start_date, end_date FROM loan_agreements WHERE lender_id = 100 AND loan_amount >= 5000;
SELECT * FROM repayment_schedules WHERE installment_number <= 5 ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT agreement_id, SUM(installment_amount) AS total_amount_paid FROM repayment_schedules GROUP BY agreement_id HAVING total_amount_paid >= 10000;
SELECT * FROM loan_agreements;
SELECT borrower_id, loan_amount FROM loan_agreements WHERE lender_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM interest_rates ORDER BY rate DESC;
SELECT loan_type, rate FROM interest_rates WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM repayment_schedules WHERE installment_amount > 500 ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM loan_agreements WHERE borrower_id = 1;
SELECT id, loan_amount, start_date FROM loan_agreements WHERE lender_id = 2 ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT loan_agreements.id, borrower_id, lender_id, loan_amount, repayment_schedules.installment_amount FROM loan_agreements JOIN repayment_schedules ON loan_agreements.id = repayment_schedules.loan_agreement_id WHERE repayment_schedules.paid = FALSE;
SELECT loan_type, rate FROM interest_rates WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY rate DESC;

SELECT loan_agreements.id, borrower_id, lender_id, start_date, end_date, SUM(installment_amount) AS total_paid FROM loan_agreements JOIN repayment_schedules ON loan_agreements.id = repayment_schedules.loan_agreement_id WHERE lender_id = 3 GROUP BY loan_agreements.id;
SELECT * FROM loan_agreements;
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, loan_amount FROM loan_agreements WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount, loan_start_date FROM loan_agreements ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT lender_name, loan_amount FROM loan_agreements WHERE lender_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM loan_agreements WHERE loan_start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT borrower_name, lender_name, loan_amount FROM loan_agreements ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM interest_rates WHERE interest_rate > 3.5 AND loan_id IN (SELECT loan_id FROM loan_agreements WHERE borrower_name = 'Alice');
SELECT u.username, u.email, l.loan_amount FROM users u JOIN loan_agreements l ON u.user_id = l.loan_id;
SELECT r.interest_rate, s.installment_amount, s.due_date FROM interest_rates r JOIN repayment_schedules s ON r.loan_id = s.loan_id;
SELECT * FROM loan_agreements;
SELECT agreement_id, borrower_id, lender_id FROM loan_agreements;
SELECT agreement_id, loan_amount, loan_duration FROM loan_agreements WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM repayment_schedules WHERE is_paid = FALSE;
SELECT agreement_id, payment_due_date, payment_amount FROM repayment_schedules ORDER BY payment_due_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM loan_agreements;
SELECT agreement_id, loan_amount, loan_duration FROM loan_agreements ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM interest_rates WHERE loan_type = 'Personal Loan';
SELECT agreement_id, payment_due_date, payment_amount FROM repayment_schedules WHERE is_paid = false ORDER BY payment_due_date;
SELECT l.agreement_id, l.loan_amount, r.interest_rate FROM loan_agreements l JOIN interest_rates r ON l.interest_rate = r.interest_rate;
